data.text:
ok @johnarundel1 I need your help :(  I'm really close, but struggling to get some dependencies right for the clean install. 

The problem is this:

in modules/sosol/manifests/app.pp the exec task for 'install-sosol', now that it uses the tomcat manager for deployment, can't be run before the sosol tomcat instance is installed and the tomcat admin user and roles are created.  I have that dependency on the admin user and roles working, but the trouble is that both those tasks (which are in modules/sosol/manifests/tomcat.pp) and the install-sosol task notify reload-tomcat (which should really be named restart, but whatever). And it seems that Puppet, knowing that all of these tasks trigger a reload, waits until they are all done.  But I need the order to be:

1. create the tomcat instance
2. add the tomcat user and roles
3. RESTART Tomcat so that the damn user and roles are really there
4. insall-sosol
5. RESTART Tomcat because tomcat can't cope with deployments without restarting because it leaks memory

I'm not positive that I've analyzed the failure to deploy the app properly but based upon the bootstrap output, I think the above describes what is happening:

Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::Tomcat/Tomcat::Config::Server::Tomcat_users[tomcatmanagerguirole]/File[/var/lib/tomcat6/conf/tomcat-users.xml]/owner: owner changed 'root' to 'tomcat6'
Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::Tomcat/Tomcat::Config::Server::Tomcat_users[tomcatmanagerguirole]/Augeas[/var/lib/tomcat6-tomcat_users-role-manager-gui-tomcatmanagerguirole]/returns: executed successfully
Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::Tomcat/Tomcat::Config::Server::Tomcat_users[tomcatmanagerscriptrole]/Augeas[/var/lib/tomcat6-tomcat_users-role-manager-script-tomcatmanagerscriptrole]/returns: executed successfully
Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::Tomcat/Tomcat::Config::Server::Tomcat_users[tomcatadminuser]/Augeas[/var/lib/tomcat6-tomcat_users-user-admin-tomcatadminuser]/returns: executed successfully
Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::App/Exec[install-sosol]: Triggered 'refresh' from 1 events
Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::App/File[/var/www/templates]/ensure: created
Notice: /Stage[main]/Site::Profiles::Tomcat/Exec[reload-tomcat]: Triggered 'refresh' from 3 events

Can you help?

checkItem.name: Prevent failing sass build of invalid editor.css

data.text: awesome. it's the warble war clean command that's creating the invalid editor.css.

The editor.css issue is vexing. Sometimes an invalid editor.css gets built in the sosol repo and sometimes it doesn't. It seems only to happen on the first run of the sosol-install.sh script, and from there on out, once its removed from the directory, it doesn't get built again. complete nonsense.

Just using exec to clone the repo isn't enough because we want to use puppet to manage the release based upon the release version in hiera.  We may just need to write our own workaround to fix this. Maybe we can reuse what we did for capitains here?

data.text:
Possible bug in `puppetlabs-vcsrepo` (Looks like https://projects.puppetlabs.com/issues/11278, but that's fixed.)

      vcsrepo { '/home/deployer/sosol_config':
        ensure   => latest,
        provider => git,
        source   => $sosol_config_url,
      }
      
    Notice: /Stage[main]/Sosol::App/Vcsrepo[/home/deployer/sosol_config]/ensure: Updating to latest '00faf44a36bc626065918e7278006cb1bf62b89b' revision
    Error: Execution of '/usr/bin/git checkout --force -b 00faf44a36bc626065918e7278006cb1bf62b89b --track origin/00faf44a36bc626065918e7278006cb1bf62b89b' returned 128: fatal: Cannot update paths and switch to branch '00faf44a36bc626065918e7278006cb1bf62b89b' at the same time.
    Did you intend to checkout origin/00faf44a36bc626065918e7278006cb1bf62b89b' which can not be resolved as commit?

    On branch master
    Your branch is behind 'origin/master' by 4 commits, and can be fast-forwarded.
      (use "git pull" to update your local branch)
        
    nothing to commit, working directory clean

card.name: look into aws module for managing rds/instance setup

data.text: ah, but tomcat is not obeying our config...
@johnarundel1 on the other hand, the tomcat server seems to be starting without incident.

hmm, seems the git checkout of the sosol code isn't quite fixed yet

```
Error: Execution of 'git clone https://github.com/sosol/sosol /home/deployer/sosol' returned 1: 
Error: /Stage[main]/Sosol::App/Vcsrepo[/home/deployer/sosol]/ensure: change from absent to latest failed: Execution of 'git clone https://github.com/sosol/sosol /home/deployer/sosol' returned 1: 
```

So I fixed the Puppet config for Tomcat, and it now happily installs and tries to start the instance, but that fails:

	Jun 24, 2016 3:16:53 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.Embedded initDirs
	SEVERE: Cannot find specified temporary folder at /usr/share/tomcat6/temp
	Jun 24, 2016 3:16:53 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina load
	WARNING: Can't load server.xml from /usr/share/tomcat6/conf/server.xml
	Jun 24, 2016 3:16:53 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.Embedded initDirs
	SEVERE: Cannot find specified temporary folder at /usr/share/tomcat6/temp
	Jun 24, 2016 3:16:53 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina load
	WARNING: Can't load server.xml from /usr/share/tomcat6/conf/server.xml
	Jun 24, 2016 3:16:53 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina start
	SEVERE: Cannot start server. Server instance is not configured.
	
I feel like we're close!
